member.name: T:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver
member.summary: This is the driver to deal with Axe.core.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.results
member.summary: Result Type -> { Rule ID -> { HTML, Target, PageURL, ActionInformation: [ActionName, ActionNum, TestSetName, TestSetNum] } }.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.pageInfo
member.summary: Page URL -> { Page Title, Browser Title }. Also keeps Page URL's in order of creation.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.urlOrder
member.summary: List to preserve order of urls.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.ruleInfo
member.summary: Rule ID -> Description, Rule Tag, Impact, Help, Help URL.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.tags
member.summary: The tags of the AODA test. Flag can add or remove 'best-practices' from tags.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.logger
member.summary: Logger to use when logging.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.filePath
member.summary: The filpath to the temporary folder.

member.name: F:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.firstRun
member.summary: Flag to determine whether this run is the first Analyze() or not.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.CaptureResult(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: This captures the AODA result for this webpage.
member.param: List of information about the ActionOnObject that called the test. Keys: "pageInfo", "actionName", "testCaseName", "testCaseNum".

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.LogResults(System.String)
member.summary: Logs the result for this file.
member.param: Location to save all the results.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.CreateHTMLReport(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the HTML report based on the JSON results.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.WriteToExcelData(AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the result to the excel sheet under checklist.
member.param: any comments that it comes with.
The id of the rule (for best practice).

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.GetCriteriaId(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Finds the Success Criteria tags inside the ruleTags. Converts to Criteria Id.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.MapAxeResult(Deque.AxeCore.Commons.AxeResultItem[],System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Populate RuleInfo and Results based on AxeResultItems[] passed in.
member.param: The different results that were found.
The url used for this page.
Information about when the node was found.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.AxeDriver.FillRuleInfo(Deque.AxeCore.Commons.AxeResult)
member.summary: Filling out the ruleInfo data structure based on the first AxeResult from Analyze().

members.member:
Adding the individual items to the ruleInfo data structure.
/// An AxeResultItem[] given by an AxeResult.

member.name: T:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel
member.summary: The excel test reporter object.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a new Excel report.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.CriteriaID
member.summary: Gets or sets Success Criteria tested. Those not in set -> 'Requires Manual Testing'.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.ExcelData
member.summary: Gets or sets the data to write to the excel sheet. Rule ID -> { Result Type -> Comment }.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.Issues
member.summary: Gets or sets the AODA defects/issues (includes violations and incompletes) IssueType -> Rule ID -> Issue Log List.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.UrlList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of all urls tested, in order.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets name of the project.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.FileLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the location to save the file to.

member.name: P:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.CellStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the cell style for all written cells.

member.name: M:AxeAccessibilityDriver.TestReportExcel.WriteToExcel
member.summary: Writes the aoda results to the excel file.

member.summary: Updating the checklist values.

member.summary: Updates the issue sheet.
member.param: The workbook containing the issue sheet.

member.summary: Sets/creates all the rows needed in the Issue Sheet for all issues.
member.returns: The new current row of the sheet.
member.param: Whether it's a Violation or an Incomplete.
The list of all possible criteria options.

member.summary: Sets the cell value AND the cell style.

The value to be inputted into the cell.
